title: Flatwoken Touch
author: Alessandro Roncone + Others
comment: A minimalist icon theme by Alessandro Roncone, with contributions by Bodan Rosu, plainicon, freepik, and Joan CiberSheep

title: uNumix
author: The Numix Project + Joan CiberSheep
comment: Numix is the official icon theme for the Numix Project, ported to Ubuntu Touch by Joan CiberSheep. This icon pack features icons the Numix icon theme, Joan CiberSheep and many others.

title: Faenza Example
author: Matthieu James (tiheum)
comment: This is an example icon pack to show off the new icon pack feature in Falcon

title: Papirus Example
author: Papirus Dev Team
comment: This is an example icon pack to show off the new icon pack feature in Falcon
